name: Minds and Monsters by Knights of Borria
name_original: Minds and Monsters by Knights of Borria
description:
"This is your first adventure, are you really ready for what comes? It doesn't matter anymore, you've got to take that leap..."

Minds and Monsters is a deck building game where you have to manage the mental traits of an adventurer who is going on his first adventure.

Hover over icons and sprites to reveal more detailed information about their abilities.

There are three types of card this young adventurer uses, his ATTACK ones for whackin' stuff. DEFEND for blockin'  and PREPARE to make your next card more powerful!
